page.title: 20TRANSPORT.
page.content: {Roads.}Area has one 'A' road the A4112 running through it, transversed by numerous 'B' roads, one of which is still gated.All these roads are maintained by Hereford and Worcester County Council. {Private Transport.}Very few families are without a car as Public Transport is almost nonexistant. In 1985 a {Community Wheels Scheme }was started to assist people without transport to make essential journeys. {Bus Service,}On Tuesdays and Fridays a Service runs between Leominster and Tenbury Wells along the A4112. During the summer months a service from Birmingham to Aberystwyth and return also travels along this route on certain days. {Railway.}The nearest Station is at Leominster.
